item.title: Getting started with Windows Phone 7 application development
item.description: Get ready to create your first Windows Phone 7 (WP7) application! With only minimum software development skills, you can create your very own shiny new WP7 app. Get the tools The first step is to go get the tools you’ll need to build your application. Microsoft has the best development tools in world (in my humble opinion).
